text: Claudett de Jesus Ribeiro OMC is a Brazilian geographer and public administrator. In 2011, she was awarded the Ordem do Mérito Cultural. Ribeiro founded the Center for Afro-Brazilian studies at the Federal University of Maranhão. She served as a consultant for UNICEF, for whom she helped develop educational programs in Maranhão and Piauí. In 2009, she served as the Secretary for Racial Equality for the Brazilian government. ==References== Category:Recipients of the Order of Cultural Merit (Brazil) Category:Brazilian geographers Category:Brazilian women scientists Category:Women government ministers of Brazil Category:Women geographers
title: Claudett de Jesus Ribeiro
